title: DJ Sona Speechs
body: So recently I've played DJ Sona and her Knetic she says some Classic Sona speechs

replies.body:
Hey WrostNightmare,

When Sona's VO lines play, do they sound similar to some of her base VO (there are hints of base VO mixed in), or is it blatantly her base VO with no mixing?
I have the same problem as WrostNightmare, its sometimes both.
